snippet: The Jets slowed Denver to the point that they had the ball with a chance to tie the score midway through the fourth quarter, but their offense sputtered, and Geno Smith threw a fate-sealing interception.
abstract: Denver Broncos defeat New York Jets, 31-17; Jets had chance to tie score midway through the fourth quarter, but their offense sputtered, and quarterback Geno Smith threw an interception.
lead_paragraph: The Jets slowed Denver to the point that they had the ball with a chance to tie the score midway through the fourth quarter, but their offense sputtered, and Geno Smith threw a fate-sealing interception.

headline.main: Jets, Falling to 1-5, Can’t Even Celebrate Their Moral Victory
headline.print_headline: Jets, Falling to 1-5, Can’t Even Celebrate Their Moral Victory
